[/split_line_heading][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]Warriors are the only class that can take on the Kingdoms largest class of player in Free-For-All battle: The Adventurer – the Kingdom’s free-to-play players who are on The Path of the Warrior.

Join a Tribe, Village, City or Kingdom and get accepted into their War Party and you’ll be paired up a Commander who will give you access to powerful weapons and gear through the War Party armory.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”none” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”50″ bottom_padding=”50″ text_align=”left” row_position=”default” row_position_tablet=”inherit” row_position_phone=”inherit” overflow=”visible” pointer_events=”all”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”left” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”2/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” gradient_type=”default” column_padding_type=”default”][nectar_text_inline_images media_type=”images” images=”1377″ image_size=”medium” image_effect=”none” image_loading=”default” text_direction=”default” font_size_desktop=”55PX”]

BUILDER CLASS

[/nectar_text_inline_images][split_line_heading animation_type=”line-reveal-by-space” font_style=”h2″ line_reveal_by_space_text_effect=”default” content_alignment=”default” mobile_content_alignment=”center” link_target=”_self” text_content=”MERGE 5 BUILDERS OF THE SAME CLASS TO LEVEL YOUR CHARACTER UP TO THE NEXT BATTLE CLASS” text_direction=”default”]

We decided to move

forward with building

[/split_line_heading][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]
All Builders are part of the the Banana Kingdom’s Builders Guild right out of the gate. Only builders can craft and sell the many structural NFTs that will see the Kingdom take shape.
This includes, homes, buildings, defense/perimeter walls, architectural items and more.
Builders don’t just tinker all day however, they’re fighters, know to wield a variety of massive warhammers.

All Builders are automatic members of the Banana Kingdom’s Builders Guild. Builders have the exclusive rights to craft and sell structural NFTs, which are essential to developing the entire Banana Kingdom. These structures includes homes, buildings, defense walls, architectural items, and more.

Builders may focus mainly on their craft, but they’re solely focused on the Kingdom’s construction; they’re also formidable opponents known to wield a variety of massive warhammers, with precision.

[/split_line_heading][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]Commanders have a unique place in a War Party. Scouting talent is their hobby because they know they’ll earn from it.

Commanders can stockpile a War Party’s armory and lend weapons and gear to the party’s warriors, earning a percentage of Tokens the Warriors make from having their gear equipped. What’s more is if a Tournament or a raid comes and a few warriors can’t make it, a Commander can takeover gameplay for those Warriors and earn half of what the Warriors would have gotten if the tournament or raid is successful is.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”none” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” top_padding=”50″ bottom_padding=”50″ text_align=”left” row_position=”default” row_position_tablet=”inherit” row_position_phone=”inherit” overflow=”visible” pointer_events=”all”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”inherit” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”left” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”2/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” gradient_type=”default” column_padding_type=”default”][nectar_text_inline_images media_type=”images” images=”1377″ image_size=”medium” image_effect=”none” image_loading=”default” text_direction=”default” font_size_desktop=”55PX”]

[/split_line_heading][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]Oracles are extremely rare in that only one is allowed on any single plot of land, no matter how large the plot. Oracles are the master’s of magic, sole crafters the Kingdom’s elemental shards and the branders of glyphs. [/split_line_heading][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]Chieftains are the landowners of the Kingdom. Overseeing the development of their plots, and the strategic takeovers of open plots and warfare against rival War Parties.

Chieftains earn a cut of many things that happen on their land and get the final say on who can live within their territorial borders.

Only a Chieftain can take a Regional Throne, and only a Chieftain can become King (or Queen) of the Banana Kingdom.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” Join a Tribe, Village, City or Kingdom and get accepted into their War Party and you’ll be paired up a Commander who will give you access to powerful weapons and gear through the War Party armory.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”none” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left” row_position=”default” row_position_tablet=”inherit” row_position_phone=”inherit” overflow=”visible” pointer_events=”all”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” desktop_text_alignment=”center” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ background_image=”8959″ background_image_position=”center top” background_image_stacking=”default” enable_bg_scale=”true” background_image_loading=”default” column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient=”linear-gradient(0deg, rgb(0, 0, 0) 10%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 90%)” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” gradient_type=”advanced” column_padding_type=”default” advanced_gradient_display_type=”linear”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height_phone=”300″][nectar_text_inline_images media_type=”images” images=”1377″ image_size=”medium” image_effect=”none” image_loading=”default” text_direction=”default” font_size_desktop=”55PX”]

[/split_line_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”padding-5-percent” column_padding_position=”top” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” desktop_text_alignment=”center” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”2/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” gradient_type=”default” column_padding_type=”default”][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]All Builders are part of the the Banana Kingdom’s Builders Guild right out of the gate. Only builders can craft and sell the many structural NFTs that will see the Kingdom take shape.

This includes: homes, buildings, defense/perimeter walls, architectural items and more.

Builders don’t just tinker all day however, they’re fighters, know to wield a variety of massive warhammers.

All Builders are automatic members of the Banana Kingdom’s Builders Guild. Builders have the exclusive rights to craft and sell structural NFTs, which are essential to developing the entire Banana Kingdom. These structures includes homes, buildings, defense walls, architectural items, and more.

[/nectar_text_inline_images][split_line_heading animation_type=”line-reveal-by-space” font_style=”h3″ line_reveal_by_space_text_effect=”default” content_alignment=”default” mobile_content_alignment=”center” link_target=”_self” text_content=”COMBINE THE 5 BATTLEFIED KNOWLEDGE OF COMMANDERS TO LEVEL YOUR CHARACTER UP TO THE NEXT BATTLE CLASS” text_direction=”default” font_size_phone=”22px”]

[/split_line_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”padding-5-percent” column_padding_position=”top” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” desktop_text_alignment=”center” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”2/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” gradient_type=”default” column_padding_type=”default”][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]Commanders have a unique place in a War Party. Scouting talent is their hobby because they know they’ll earn from it.
 
Commanders can stockpile a War Party’s armory and lend weapons and gear to the party’s warriors, earning a percentage of Tokens the Warriors make from having their gear equipped.
 
What’s more is if a Tournament or a raid comes and a few warriors can’t make it, a Commander can takeover gameplay for those Warriors and earn half of what the Warriors would have gotten if the tournament or raid is successful is.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner equal_height=”yes” content_placement=”middle” column_margin=”none” column_direction=”default” column_direction_tablet=”default” column_direction_phone=”default” text_align=”left” row_position=”default” row_position_tablet=”inherit” row_position_phone=”inherit” overflow=”visible” pointer_events=”all”][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_position=”all” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” desktop_text_alignment=”default” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ background_image=”8965″ background_image_position=”center top” background_image_stacking=”default” enable_bg_scale=”true” background_image_loading=”default” column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient=”linear-gradient(0deg, rgb(0, 0, 0) 10%, rgba(0, 0, 0, 0) 90%)” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ width=”1/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” gradient_type=”advanced” column_padding_type=”default” advanced_gradient_display_type=”linear”][divider line_type=”No Line” custom_height_phone=”300″][nectar_text_inline_images media_type=”images” images=”1377″ image_size=”medium” image_effect=”none” image_loading=”default” text_direction=”default” font_size_desktop=”55PX”]

[/split_line_heading][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner column_padding=”no-extra-padding” column_padding_tablet=”inherit” column_padding_phone=”padding-5-percent” column_padding_position=”top” column_element_direction_desktop=”default” column_element_spacing=”default” centered_text=”true” desktop_text_alignment=”center” tablet_text_alignment=”default” phone_text_alignment=”default” background_color_opacity=”1″ background_hover_color_opacity=”1″ column_backdrop_filter=”none” column_shadow=”none” column_border_radius=”none” column_link_target=”_self” overflow=”visible” advanced_gradient_angle=”0″ gradient_direction=”left_to_right” overlay_strength=”0.3″ width=”2/3″ tablet_width_inherit=”default” animation_type=”default” bg_image_animation=”none” border_type=”simple” column_border_width=”none” column_border_style=”solid” gradient_type=”default” column_padding_type=”default”][vc_column_text text_direction=”default”]Oracles are extremely rare in that only one is allowed on any single plot of land, no matter how large the plot. Overseeing the development of their plots, and the strategic takeovers of open plots and warfare against rival War Parties.

Chieftains earn a cut of many things that happen on their land and get the final say on who can live within their territorial borders.
